search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Passion.io (passion-io.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I found it! Here's the direct URL to the official pricing page for Passion.io: [https://passion.io/pricing](https://passion.io/pricing) .

### Over 10k creators have worked with us to build their freedom lifestyle

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19a524a3edfbf40f2f8b_Menina.avif)

#### Menina Fortunato

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"2 yrs ago, I joined Passion… I was broke with no offer. Now, $100k in revenue in the last 6 months."

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19abf62c29006d31bbbd_Dance%20with%20Menina.avif)

#### Dance with Menina

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19c4043c6effb301f537_Makinsey.avif)

#### Makinsey Chilcote

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"I would get emails from Google and Apple and I knew they were dealing with it. I didn’t have to stress or worry about it. That allowed me to focus on the content creation and what I’m good at rather than the tech side that would have taken me a couple of years to learn."

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19ca269249f68026b5c2_Journey%20to%20Rise.avif)

#### Journey to Rise

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19bc2d9673314f08e023_Miranda%20Murry.avif)

#### Miranda Murry

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"I chose Passion because it allows me to help myself and help others. With my own app, I can provide my clients with the tools they need to focus on the guest experience. And I can provide these tools at their fingertips where they can learn on their own time, on their own devices."

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19bf4857c6305ba05693_HospitalityConcierge.avif)

#### HospitalityConcierge

![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad19401ced6fc0faa4152f_Adam.avif)

#### Adam Frater

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"A great option for people who don't want to give away a huge chunk of the pie to launch an app. It lets you create an app without any experience, get it online without paying for developers. Passion.io gives you back the power—gives you the control."

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad1944bca029d420294271_CALXTHENICS.avif)

#### CALXTHENICS

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad1982845ad23583d9aeba_Colin.avif)

#### Colin Hiles

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"With my own branded app, I’m always available. I get updates, downloads, and feedback even when I’m working on something else. It’s gratifying to know I’m reaching my clients on their own terms and helping them change habits in a fun, easy, and fast way."

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad198742ff6b957a26e19d_Habit%20Coach%20App.avif)

#### Habit Coach App

#### Ellen Decker

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"If you’re looking to grow and scale your business for a small investment - jump on Passion.io! There is truly nothing like it!! I got my investment back in one day after I launched my app. My life has changed ever since."

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad1967a1ad22160af997f0_Fit%20in%20Twenty.avif)

#### Fit in Twenty

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/66a7b33ec9d7a81fe863f196_Star%20rating.svg)

"My audience really wanted one place to go that they could access easily from their phone when they’re traveling. And I wanted to build an app but I had no idea how and it was way too expensive. So that’s where Passion.io came along."

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad195e145cf97392cd1a3f_The%20Ultimate%20LYFE.avif)

#### The Ultimate LYFE

"I’ve never had such engagement with my students. The completion rate for lessons is incredible. For me, the community has been a lifeline. I love, love, love my Passion community."

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60866569ed6a3f700cbf0926/66ad1997001e1d9e35b73b60_LSN_%20SWAHILI%20FOR%20HOAMIs.avif)

### Common questions

#### What is Passion.io and how does it work?

![Image 92](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

Passion.io it’s your complete toolkit for achieving the freedom you’ve always wanted. It’s designed to provide you with everything you need—tools, people, and resources—to turn your ideas into reality.

‍**Here are just few things you can do with Passion.io:**‍

Build and customize your own app

*   Offer courses, products, communities, and allow your users to track their goals all in one place
*   Connect with your audience through chat, DM's and community feature
*   Get insights and practical advice from app coaches to reach your goals
*   Scale and grow your business so you can earn more with your app

#### Do I need to write code?

![Image 93](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

Not at all. You don’t need any coding skills. With our drag-and-drop tools, you can build and design your app without any technical knowledge.

#### Can I talk to a real person from Passion.io?

![Image 94](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

Yes, definitely. If you have questions, just [reach out](https://help.passion.io/hc/en-us/kb-tickets/new). We’ll help you figure out what you need and how we can support your goals.

Want to discuss building your app from scratch with Passion Plus? [Book a time here](https://landing.passion.io/apply-to-passion-plus) to chat with an expert.

#### I'm new to apps. Can you help with best-practices?

![Image 95](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

Start with our free webinar, “How Coaches, Teachers, and Creators Are Writing Their Own Paychecks in 2024.” It’s a great way to learn how you can earn up to $10k with your app and turn new strangers into clients.

We also offer free guides and resources. They give [practical tips](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZ3sw0iBWKt8_OZt7YMUkS0Q4OO7EZ8iA&adb_sid=b2f2d1e8-9739-4fff-bf05-25723ac70cdb) on creating a sales funnel, developing the right mindset, overcoming mental blocks, adding gamification features to your app, and much more. For more inspiration, listen to the [Million Dollar Creator podcast](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZ3sw0iBWKt_14P5bGFhceqIin4SOGRwa&adb_sid=b2f2d1e8-9739-4fff-bf05-25723ac70cdb): Matt, our co-founder, interviews successful creators who share their stories and tips for making it big with their own products.

Once you join us, you’ll become part of our PassionFighters community of over 11,000 creators. It’s a great place to connect, join live webinars, and get support from others on the same journey.

You can also jump into our easy 30-day Expert Unleashed Challenge. This program helps you find your audience and launch your app with step-by-step videos and worksheets to keep you on track.

If you choose the Growth Plan or higher, you’ll get a dedicated onboarding mentor and app submissions coach to guide and support you while building and publishing your app. Passion Plus members also have their own personal Growth Coach and access to an exclusive community.

#### How much can I charge my clients?

![Image 96](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

The sky’s the limit - you can charge from $1 to $10,000+.

You can have multiple price points. For instance, you might set up a monthly subscription, like $34, giving your clients ongoing access to your content and features. This is a fantastic way to build a steady, ongoing revenue stream.

You can also charge a one-time fee for special courses or premium content. For example, pricing something at $15,600 or more is perfectly feasible.

If you are just getting started, it’s often best to begin with one main offer. This helps you focus your efforts, build confidence, and understand your audience better. As you grow, you can introduce additional offers and adjust your pricing. We have a proven system to help you nail down your niche, craft compelling offers, and set the right prices. Dan explains it here.

The more engaging and interactive a customer’s experience is, the higher the perceived value is. That’s why people with custom apps can charge more than traditional online courses hosted on big platforms.

#### What kind of people and brands use Passion.io?

![Image 97](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

We have 10,000+ creators spanning a variety of use cases and niches. Check out some of our favourites by clicking here. Whatever your niche or business stage, we provide step-by-step training from day one.

#### Are there any hidden fees?

![Image 98](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

There are no hidden fees with Passion.io.

To launch your app in the Google Play Store, you will need to apply for a Google Play Store account. Google will charge you a one-time fee of $25 for lifetime access.

For Apple, it is similar. Apple will charge you $99/year to have access to the Apple App Store. We provide step by step instructions to help you with the app submission process.

#### Can I get my money back if this isn’t right for me?

![Image 99](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/60afab0b202f53c8093e04cf_Vector.svg)

You bet. We offer a 30-day, hassle-free money-back guarantee. If Passion.io isn’t the right fit, let us know within 30 days, and we’ll refund you completely.

![Image 100](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/606317d685e6b189218df406/6470f51b2886adf856b2d363_Passion.io%20App%20Webinar.webp)

Still have more questions?

We’ve got you covered. Grab your spot in our free webinar or chat with our team to discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.
